website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive rectangular mirror that has a wide frame available in multiple colors.
pros: Can be hung vertically or horizontally
Mid-sized mirror that will fit almost anywhere with dimensions of 26.5 inches by 32.5 inches
Neutral frame colors of white, bronze, pewter, or silver will fit in with the color scheme of any room of your home nicely
cons: Back consists of kraft paper, which isn't as sturdy as wood

customer_reviews.title: Poorly built plastic
customer_reviews.text: Poorly built plastic. The gaps are bigger than they appear in the picture I attached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good things about this mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for our master bath. I purchased based off the fact that I believe the mirror was highly recommended by Amazon. There were also tons of favorable reviews. They shipped very quick. We are in the middle of a bath reno so I only have one opened thus far. I love it! Looks so nice with our new vanity. The frame looks fancy and high quality- for a great price! I also love that you have the option to hang horizontally or vertically. The mirror itself also appears very clear and doesn't seem to fog during showers. I would definitely purchase this item again!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Skincare Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous mirror
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with my mirror! I always wanted like a vanity mirror but since those were a lot of money I got myself this mirror and it’s perfect on my table! It arrived not damaged at all, love my new mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Price - Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror especially for the price. It takes a bit to hang due to size, but worth the effort. It was packaged very well and nothing was damaged. You will need to purchase a couple of wood screws and anchor bolts (less than$5 at Lowes) and will need a drill due to weight to hang. Exactly the size I wanted. I bought the white frame mirror for a spare bedroom and didn't want a full length mirror but wanted something big enough guests could view themselves. Really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this puppy to cover the gaping hole left by a broken medicine cabinet. It’s a lot nicer than I was anticipating. It arrived well packed too.
customer_reviews.author: Ann on the Run

customer_reviews.title: Flawed mirror
customer_reviews.text: The photo I provided shows “white spots”. Those are “bubbles and a pitted” area on the mirror. My husband hung this for me and pointed it out. Because the mirror is so large I had not noticed the flaws. I chose to keep it because the flaws are high up and not in my line of sight when I apply makeup. Check the surface BEFORE you hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good!!!
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to be a great value for the money. Could not find a similar one in either of the local home stores in my area. There was a very, very, very small separation in two of the joints, but I filled it in with a very, very small bit of chaulk and it looks great. Would recommend. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: EFreed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bathroom Mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was exactly what I wanted. It's being used in a bathroom so the plastic frame is ideal (it doesn't look cheap). The glass is the clearest mirror I may have ever had in my house. Not sure what the difference is but I like it. There were no defects on it and it hung easily. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Matt R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mirror
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with a desk and stick on “Hollywood” lights because I wanted a vanity to do my makeup without spending a ton of money. It comes securely packaged so it didn’t break in the mail. A vanity that would come with all three of those things together can be a couple hundred dollars but it was so much cheaper for me to buy them separately. Plus if I ever decide I want to turn the desk into the workspace or hang the mirror on the wall I can do that easily!
customer_reviews.author: Brynne Goodfield

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality mirrors. We purchased two of these. First one arrived broken, though there was no issue getting it replaced. The two mirrors we ended up with are of good quality. Mitered corners are good. The only complaint is that the mirrors - the actual mirror - have slight/ faint imperfections in them (both mirrors). For the price paid, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the quality but once they arrived I opened it and this is a solid mirror. I ordered 2 so far we’ve opened and used one. I’ll update once the second is up on the wall but so far so good! Sturdy frame, well made, mirror is perfect there isn’t a warp or scratch anywhere. It’s a quality piece. If anything is wrong it’s a fluke because these are good mirrors!
customer_reviews.author: Carol D.

customer_reviews.title: Very thin frame/hooks fell out immediately!
customer_reviews.text: From the front, the frame looks beautiful. On the back however, the hooks are drilled into a small "frame" of wood. The tiny screws immediately pulled out of the wood and the wood split/cracked. I had to drill secondary holes and move the hooks up. Not sure how long they will hold. I'm expecting the mirror to fall off the wall any day now. I would not recommend this product. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Bond Gilstrap

customer_reviews.title: Black marks...
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright but the silver finish is wearing off. Strange right? It’s barely ever touched if only to wipe the steam off or clean the mirror. Black plastic marks are showing through the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! No issues with it being delivered
customer_reviews.text: Using it as a bathroom mirror. Looks great! No issues with it being delivered. It was nicely wrapped & protected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my vanity as i didn’t want to spend a fortune on a mirror already attached to a desk so i got this & it turned out super cute! i got some lights to stick on & it’s been great using it for my makeup
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was exactly what we were looking for: simple and sleek. It’s sturdy and identical mirrors at local hardware stores are about 20% higher in price. Super happy with this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Loehner Schiavone

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is exactly what I was looking for. It looks very nice and is the perfect size. I wish it were a little easier to hang but using a measuring tape, we were able to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, large mirror for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mirror for the cost! The mirror itself is beveled along the perimeter for a more elegant feel.
customer_reviews.author: fryphish

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for price! Very sturdy and not cheap looking at all. I added lights to it for a vanity I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Nolden

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, no scuffs or marks on it and the mirror arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: S Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Clean simple look
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror with clean lines to it is a nice update for any bathroom. Ours is small, so it actually makes it look bigger than it really is. However, mounting it was a challenge. Mostly from our end as our house is old and looking for a stud to mount the mirror on was frustrating. We got it though and it looks nice
customer_reviews.author: tara hills

customer_reviews.title: Loving our new mirrors
customer_reviews.text: We ordered three of these for the bathrooms in our new home. One arrived shattered. But the return process was quick and simple and the replacement arrived two days later. We are loving all three mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Serena S.

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is perfect and value for money, I put it up in my girls bathroom and looks great and works well with the vanity
customer_reviews.author: Livvy

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: We needed to order bath vanity mirrors for a new build and I couldn't find anything less than $100+. I did find this mirror and was pleasantly surprised at the look, the professional packing and backing. I am an artist used to backing and packing artwork for shipping. This was quality! Beveled mirror a nice touch. We went back and ordered two more!
customer_reviews.author: michelleb

customer_reviews.title: You can't hang them.  Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: We were not able to hang them, the hooks on the back tore out of the frame. They are not made very well. Very disappointed really wanted them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful 🤗
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it opened up the corner & reflects my decor. I will definitely purchase again 👍
customer_reviews.author: "Primazon"👩‍🦱

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Quality mirror can be hung either way you want has the hangers set both ways
customer_reviews.author: derek cross

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mirror for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like the mirror. Great for the kids bathroom. The reason I only did 4 stars was my annoyance of having to clean the frame for an hour to get some weird adhesive off of it. And the adhesive wasn't from shipping or packing. But it cleaned up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: AnnRS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror. We put it in my daughter’s nursery. It looks classy and the cost was good. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Mine came with a small chip. I used it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Appears high quality, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this mirror. Bought for my bathroom to go over the vanity. Looks really sharp and is pretty large especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mirror
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror. Arrived on time and intact. The size is just Perfect! I Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this mirror. Excellent quality! It looks perfect in my newly renovated bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Sara M. Scoma

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mirror to go over my vanity/desk and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly great quality. This was packaged great and seems much more expensive than it was. It is a great weight for me propping it up on my vanity table.
customer_reviews.author: Jencat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror packed perfectly came in a few days so happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mirror. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because the first one came shattered in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pink Undertone
customer_reviews.text: Warning this mirror has a pink hue to the frame with very prominent black marks in the design. It does have a silver finish overall however the photo does not accurately show the design.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Z.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good mirror. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my wall. Came quickly and unbroken. What more could I want?
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I have one comment about the mirror. It restricts ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one comment about the mirror. It restricts you from using wire to attach it to the wall. This requires using a level and spacing the hangers accurately. It should be changed to allow the use of a wire to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when you order glass
customer_reviews.text: Box still ok but mirror broken. What can I do??? Really so sad.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: MCS White Rectangular Wall Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is perfect for my needs. I was not able to find one just like it locally.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Gaps in corners
customer_reviews.text: Love the mirror,beveled glass,very nice frame! My complaint is the mitered corners. The joints are not joined very well, might have loosened up during shipping. But I like it .
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We really like how this mirror fits and looks in our small bath.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne M. O'heran

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: looks very nice in my bathroom, adds to the 'coastal' look even though it's plain. I really like the smooth white finish
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice hung on my grey wall over my fireplace
customer_reviews.author: M W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in our bathroom and it looks great. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McTague

customer_reviews.title: A "Must Buy"
customer_reviews.text: Please buy this mirror. It is so beautiful and it's everything that I expected.... thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gonya Jangaba

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and solid looking. Hung this in my laundry room above utility sink.
customer_reviews.author: NLP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is just perfect.... my granddaughter loves it over her dresser
customer_reviews.author: Denny O.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't see myself. Seems to work really well .
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Missing installation screws...
customer_reviews.text: It’s to replace my bathroom mirror. I was just disappointed that the screws. Or nails to hang it was not included. I have not hang it yet as I did not got the chance to get the screws to install it. It’s still in the box...😔
customer_reviews.author: AAP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these mirrors. They worked very well in our master bathroom. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The brush Nicole is very scratchy and not a very good finish
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror! One of the corner joints is not tight, but other than that it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: SJC

customer_reviews.title: No mounting system, beautiful mirror
customer_reviews.text: Packaged great! Nervous to purchase a mirror online, however packaging was great and mirror looks wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Mitcheltree

customer_reviews.title: Cute, simple mirror
customer_reviews.text: Two of the 4 edges weren't merged together correctly and it doesn't have a seamless look to it, but overall it looks OK for the price. It was exactly what I needed for my tiny vanity.
customer_reviews.author: laura hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Constructed Frame/Handsome Beveled Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Handsome mirror. Construction of the mirror I received is flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Desk

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in my daughter's bedroom above her dresser. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: lmernst83

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a mirror to match the mirrors in my downstairs bathroom from the builder. Great quality for the price and it matches very well!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Miller

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Mirrors are just what we wanted, good size, good looking, good price.
customer_reviews.author: ccchris

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Mirror arrived broken. Was redoing my bathroom and did not open the box before I was ready to install. Now it’s too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C.

customer_reviews.title: Great cosmetic accessory!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this when I bought it for her “girlie cave”!!!
customer_reviews.author: T Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I used this mirror for a vanity set up and I absolutely love it! It’s a bit pricey but it’s worth it. It’s pretty big! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rrivera

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, sturdy, and looks great
customer_reviews.text: exactly as pictured, love this mirror and it wasn't as expensive as mirrors at home stores.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with this my mirror. Exactly what I was looking for. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Naz Gul

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Definitely smaller than expected. Frame around the mirror so wide and you don’t have much mirror!
customer_reviews.author: UGUR O.

customer_reviews.title: cheap looking, i tried to return this item, ...
customer_reviews.text: cheap looking, i tried to return this item, it cost $20 to return. almost half of the price of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Welborn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was very nice but it was too big for the space I wanted it in

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and heavy. Great spots to hang on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Pulsifer

customer_reviews.title: Love the mirror
customer_reviews.text: There was a lot of scratches on frame. This mirror was packed very well so unsure how they got there.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Melo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Big gaps in all four frame corners. Awful. Shipping back.
customer_reviews.author: Alexey Shalashov

customer_reviews.title: Came shattered!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a zero if I could! Product came completely shattered. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mirror. Exactly what I expected and thankfully didn't break in shipping! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sara Tiamson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror. just what we needed. came quick and price nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, the package arrived in great condition and the mirror looked great. Im satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good utility, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, but mitre corners don't fit well. Get what you pay for I guess. Good utility mirror.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great. Is has a nice finish and looks great in mu bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it, it'll be the perfect size for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the mirror within 2 days but it was cracked when I opened it. I requested a replacement and it came in 2 days also, in one piece! I love it, it'll be the perfect size for my vanity! Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jenae

customer_reviews.title: Worst mirrors I've seen.
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are NOT worth the money. The color has a purple hue to it. Construction is as bad as it gets, none of the miter joints line up correctly. The only thing holdin this mirror together is a paper backing and some cardboard staples to the back. The hardware used to hang is clearly visible from the side. Find something better if you are looking for quality.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The edges are broken 😢Never able reach anyone to replace it
customer_reviews.author: Matt snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great price too
customer_reviews.text: It is gorgeous in my hallway bathroom. Exactly what I was looking for. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stiles

customer_reviews.title: good mirror. sufficiently large at a good price
customer_reviews.text: good mirror. sufficiently large at a good price. the frame isn't flush at corners so there is small gaps but not a deal breaker. It is clean looking and the frame isn't overbearing. It has two vertical hooks and two horizontal hooks so you can get it perfectly level every time.
customer_reviews.author: D123

customer_reviews.title: Great looking thing
customer_reviews.text: What a great value. I used this mirror as a replacement to my borderless one in the bathroom. It really made a difference to the look of the bathroom. I never understood why people put mirrors like this in the bathroom but now I do. It wasn't the easiest mirror to install. It took me a little longer than I anticipated, but now that it's done, I'm happy with the result. Would buy again. Worth it for a rental property.
customer_reviews.author: dyeimpy19

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: different from the picture and the corners were stating to separate but still hold! other wise it is a very nice mirror
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Adequate Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror arrived On time and well bundled in package. It is a plastic not wood surround the bevel mirror. The joints of the plastic are well done for the price we pay. The beveled mirror is bright, and aluminates the light beautifully in our redo bathroom. We did go to Lowes and pick up a sturdier mounting bracket for safety, as the mirror is heavy. I would buy this again for a bathroom, bedroom or not entry way. You could probably buy this at Homedepot or Lowes for the same price or they price match Amazon. Hope this helps!🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Maineiac

customer_reviews.title: Great value and made with strength
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these mirrors for a bathroom re-do and so happy I did because they are very well made. The frames are not wood, so I feel they will hold up longer in my bathroom. The glasses in the mirrors reflect a perfect image without waving like some I've seen, so I feel a lot of quality work and thought was put into the manufacturing process . Except for the size being a tiny bit different (less than an inch on all sides), the mirrors being sold with the new vanity were almost identical, yet cost over $100 more! They were well worth what I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: LambsWool

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. We just redid our master bathroom and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. We just redid our master bathroom and I put one of these above each sink (2) and they look beautiful. There were plenty to choose from on the Amazon site, but these were some of the less expensive ones, and I hoped for the best, I think I got them!
customer_reviews.author: John D. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Good value bathroom mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent mirror for the price. We bought it to replace an old bathroom mirror and it looks great in our recently remodeled bath. I did read the reviews and the mirror does come with fairly noticeable gaps in the corner joints but a little caulk sealed them right up and it improves the appearance dramatically. The mirror is heavy and feels fairly durable. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth O.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I was renovating a second bathroom and needed a new mirror. This was a great addition for the money. Good looking and beats the old mirror we had that looked like a hospital mirror. At $55 this is a great buy! We even bought a second smaller one for our half bath. Highly recommend.....and pack excellently as well.
customer_reviews.author: KMick

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Be Happier
customer_reviews.text: We just finished remodeling our bathroom and needed two mirrors for above the vanity. These are perfect. They look great and tie the whole thing together. We have a white vanity with a marble countertop and oil rubbed bronze finishes. We had been having a hard time finding the right size mirror for the space but these are perfect and at a bargain price. We couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Kirschenmann

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mirror. I like that the hooks are already screwed on the back, and that it’s very lightweight. It’s made of some kind of plastic, but it’s put together so well one can’t tell. It’s a good price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Bargain Buy
customer_reviews.text: Why are mirrors so expensive?! I purchased this mostly because of the somewhat reasonable price (compared to others). The frame has a different design/pattern to it. It's like a silver color with black lines crackled in. Not entirely noticeable, just different.
customer_reviews.author: SadieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: ... of these at the same time The Mirrors are perfect and just what I thought they would be
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these at the same time The Mirrors are perfect and just what I thought they would be. Beautiful in my bathroom. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Nana Carolina girl

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror! I purchased this along with the chalk markers and using it as my service menu in my nail salon, it looks very elegant in my salon, I had priced comparable mirrors at upwards $125.00, I am very pleased with the quality, hanging this mirror was a breeze, I recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my mirror. It is larger than I expected it to be. I'm happy that i have found such an affordable product that works so well in a tiny space. It was in perfect shape when it was delivered. I do recommend
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Just what we expected!
customer_reviews.text: This will serve our purpose for replacing our bulletin board around our dart board. Our old one is riddled with holes from the darts that missed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mirror but I have to give it 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mirror but I have to give it 2 stars because the packaging is bad and my mirror was delivered shattered! My husband and I were both cut by the shattered mirror just trying to put it back in the package to send back.... so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror. Unfortunately arrived with broken glass.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered replacement. Arrived with broken mirror Glass. Looked like it was worth the money. Fast replacement. Second mirror arrived undamaged. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Pinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect update in bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and ready to hang. After having “shopped” various stores we felt this mirror was just what we were looking for and was well priced.
customer_reviews.author: anita

product_meta.title: MCS 21.5x27.5 Inch Rectangular Wall Mirror, 26.5x32.5 Inch Overall Size, White (20453)
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThe MCS Emma wall mirror is 26. 5 x 32. 5 Inch overall with a 1 inch beveled mirror measuring 21. 5 x 27. 5 Inch. The wide 2. 5 inch frame is molded in a nice White finish and includes installed hangers to hang the mirror either horizontally or vertically. The perfect accent mirror for the bedroom, bath, or entryway.
feature_bullets: The 2.5 inch wide frame has a clean and simple matte white finish
4 D-Ring hangers attached for quick and easy installation either vertically or horizontally
Frame Molding is made from polystyrene material and the mirror is glass

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
